47 template<class T>
48 template<typename... Args>
49 shm_obj_ref<T> shm_obj_ref<T>::create(const Args&... args) {
50  shm_obj_ref<T> result;
51  result.construct(args...);
52  return result;
53 }
54 
55 template<class T>
56 bool shm_obj_ref<T>::find() {
57  auto mem = vistle::shm<ObjData>::find(m_name);
58  m_d = mem;
59  ref();
60 
61  return valid();
62 }
63 
64 template<class T>
65 template<typename... Args>
66 void shm_obj_ref<T>::construct(const Args&... args)
67 {
68  unref();
69  if (m_name.empty())
70  m_name = Shm::the().createObjectId();
71  m_d = shm<T>::construct(m_name)(args..., Shm::the().allocator());
72  ref();
73 }
74 
75 template<class T>
76 const shm_obj_ref<T> &shm_obj_ref<T>::operator=(const shm_obj_ref<T> &rhs) {
77  unref();
78  m_name = rhs.m_name;
79  m_d = rhs.m_d;
80  ref();
81  return *this;
82 }
83 
84 template<class T>
85 const shm_obj_ref<T> &shm_obj_ref<T>::operator=(typename shm_obj_ref<T>::ObjType::const_ptr rhs) {
86  unref();
87  if (rhs) {
88  m_name = rhs->getName();
89  m_d = rhs->d();
90  } else {
91  m_name.clear();
92  m_d = nullptr;
93  }
94  ref();
95  return *this;
96 }
97 
98 template<class T>
99 const shm_obj_ref<T> &shm_obj_ref<T>::operator=(typename shm_obj_ref<T>::ObjType::ptr rhs) {
100  return std::const_pointer_cast<const ObjType>(rhs);
101 }
102 
103 template<class T>
104 bool shm_obj_ref<T>::valid() const {
105  return m_name.empty() || m_d;
106 }
107 
108 template<class T>
109 typename shm_obj_ref<T>::ObjType::const_ptr shm_obj_ref<T>::getObject() const {
110  if (!valid())
111  return nullptr;
112  typedef typename shm_obj_ref<T>::ObjType ObjType;
113  return typename ObjType::const_ptr(dynamic_cast<ObjType *>(Object::create(const_cast<typename ObjType::Data *>(&*m_d))));
114 }
115 
116 template<class T>
117 const typename shm_obj_ref<T>::ObjType::Data *shm_obj_ref<T>::getData() const {
118  if (!valid())
119  return nullptr;
120  return &*m_d;
121 }
122 
123 template<class T>
124 const shm_name_t &shm_obj_ref<T>::name() const {
125  return m_name;
126 }
127 
128 template<class T>
129 void shm_obj_ref<T>::ref() {
130  if (m_d) {
131  assert(m_name == m_d->name);
132  assert(m_d->refcount >= 0);
133  m_d->ref();
134  }
135 }
136 
137 template<class T>
138 void shm_obj_ref<T>::unref() {
139  if (m_d) {
140  assert(m_d->refcount > 0);
141  m_d->unref();
142  }
143  m_d = nullptr;
144 }
145 
146 template<class T>
147 vistle::shm_obj_ref<T>::operator bool() const {
148  return valid();
149 }
150 
151 template<class T>
152 template<class Archive>
153 void shm_obj_ref<T>::save(Archive &ar) const {
154  ar & V_NAME(ar, "obj_name", m_name);
155  assert(valid());
156  if (m_d)
157  ar.saveObject(*this);
158 }
159 
160 template<class T>
161 template<class Archive>
162 void shm_obj_ref<T>::load(Archive &ar) {
163  ar & V_NAME(ar, "obj_name", m_name);
164 
165  //assert(shmname == m_name);
166  std::string name = m_name;
167 
168  unref();
169  m_d = nullptr;
170 
171  if (m_name.empty())
172  return;
173 
174  auto obj = ar.currentObject();
175  auto handler = ar.objectCompletionHandler();
176  auto ref0 = Shm::the().getObjectFromName(name);
177  auto ref1 = T::as(ref0);
178  assert(ref0 || !ref1);
179  if (ref1) {
180  *this = ref1;
181  } else {
182  if (obj) {
183  obj->unresolvedReference();
184  }
185  }
186  ref0 = ar.getObject(name, [this, name, obj, handler]() -> void {
187  //std::cerr << "object completion handler: " << name << std::endl;
188  auto ref2 = T::as(Shm::the().getObjectFromName(name));
189  assert(ref2);
190  *this = ref2;
191  if (obj) {
192  obj->referenceResolved(handler);
193  }
194  });
195  ref1 = T::as(ref0);
196  assert(ref0 || !ref1);
197  if (ref1) {
198  // object already present: don't mess with count of outstanding references
199  *this = ref1;
200  }
201 }
202 
203 }
204 #endif
